Interface IInquiryDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGenericDao<Inquiry,java.lang.Long>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InquiryDao

    public interface IInquiryDao
extends IGenericDao<Inquiry,java.lang.Long>
    Interface for implementation by InquiryDap class for specific operations with Inquiry-entity
